short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a publicy accessible preview link for your chatGPT chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT has taken the world by storm - millions of people use it every day to solve a wide range of interesting problems.

This extension - Share ChatGPT Chat - provides a way of sharing your chats with the rest of the world. 

Let's say you've mastered the art of prompting GPT and want to share the amazing responses you've received. With this extension, all you have to do is click a button to generate a static webpage that showcases your entire chat (without any interactivity, of course). Copy the link and send it out into the world for everyone to see!

Generated a tutorial for an amazing coding project? Got ChatGPT to solve a complex financial problem? Found some laughable instances of ChatGPT hallucinating? This extension makes it easy to broadcast all your results with the world.
